title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
created_time: September 25, 2023, 03:34:59 AMLast edit: October 03, 2023, 02:24:18 AM by Royse777
content: /]ABOUT THE CAMPAIGNPrivacy is an inherent human right, and a requirement for maintaining the human condition with dignity and respect. /][banned mixer] is a bitcoin mixing service that allow you stay anonymous! The management planned to conduct the reviews in two stages. As a campaign manager, I am managing both campaigns. I confirm that I am holding a significant amount of Bitcoin to cover all expenses for both campaigns...We require experienced mixer users, not just an average review with screenshots explaining the steps of mixing...In the first stage, we are seeking 20 Bitcointalk members. You are required to test the service, including its website functionality. Please identify any competitive disadvantages and shortcomings in the functionality...NOTE.. Â The campaign will be closed once I approve 20 applications. You will be selected in groups. Each group will have a deadline to submit reviews. Please ensure not to miss the deadline, as any reviews submitted late will be rejected.REWARD..0.006 BTC.. and a ..LIFETIME DISCOUNT OF 50%.. on mixing in [banned mixer] service. Additionally, ..0.01 BTC.. will be rewarded from [banned mixer] management for the best review.MUST DO- Please perform mixing at least two times using two different browsers, and in your review, kindly mention the names of the browsers used.- For each mixing, please use a different security level (Basic, Standard, Premium).TERMS- You need to be a Senior Member or higher and have earned at least 50+ lifetime merits.- No negative trust feedback from the DT network should be present on your account.- You must apply with a Bech32 address. - Payment will be made after the review is accepted.- Discount code will be sent via PM after the review is accepted*. - Commence the review only upon acceptance. (Accepted members will be added to the campaign spreadsheet)- Kindly submit the review within the assigned deadline, or your review will be rejected.- The [banned mixer] team and I reserve the right to reject any application, including reviews.- Enrolling with more than one account is not allowed. Any accounts found in violation will be tagged.- No AI or ChatGPT content is permitted; if found, you will be banned from any signature and review campaign.HOW TO APPLY : Post the following information.Code:Bitcointalk Rank:Lifetime earned merit:Bech32 address:When you apply you automatically agree that : ..Transferring the discount code that you receive to third parties and their subsequent generations is prohibited...HOW TO SUBMIT THE REVIEW :Post the review in this thread using following format:Code:Bitcointalk username: <YOUR BITCOINTALK USERNAME><YOUR REVIEW>..SPREADSHEET..ðŸ“£This campaign is designed and managed by:General Disclaimer: We would like to make it clear that ðŸ’¹ðŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ðŸ’ªðŸ”¥ Signature & Bounty, managed by Bitcointalk member Royse777, is an independent entity and is not directly affiliated with any of the crypto startups we advertise. While we strive to promote these startups in the best possible light, our views and opinions expressed in our advertising materials do not necessarily reflect those of the startups themselves. We work with various clients across the crypto industry, and our goal is to provide high-quality advertising services to help them achieve their marketing objectives.Payment Disclaimer: Please always check the escrow wallet (if available). If the escrow wallet does not have enough balance and you think you have risk not to get paid then discontinue from the campaign. We are not liable to pay you anything that is not available on the escrow wallet.

comments.author: tumbler.io
comments.body: Friends,thank you for your attention to the project and your help in testing![banned mixer] hopes its service will satisfy you with the absolute quality of anonymization and you will become regular users of the service.The extra special award in the amount of 10mBTCÂ  for the best review will be given after each of two testing rounds.[banned mixer] will select the best review.The winner will be announced in this thread below and will receive the well-deserved award.
